name: BusinessAsUsual
description: Absence of a retrospective after individual iterations or after the completion project.

thresholds.thresholdDescription: Minimum percentage of the total number of iterations with a retrospective (0,100)
thresholds.thresholdErrorMess: Percentage must be float number between 0 and 100

thresholds.thresholdDescription: Substring that will be search in wikipages and activities
thresholds.thresholdErrorMess: Maximum number of substrings is ten and must not starts and ends with characters ||
